experiments.initial_event: Help me prepare a salad with tomatoes

goal_state.correction_event: I want salad and tomatoes be chopped in a bowl

goal_state.correction_event: I want cut banana and cut apple in a bowl

experiments.initial_event: Put everything that needs to be cooled in the refrigerator

goal_state.correction_event: You should put the milk carton and the cucumber and the salad into the refrigerator

experiments.initial_event: The floor is dirty and I want to wet-clean it

goal_state.correction_event: I want to hold the mop and you should put water into the bucket

experiments.initial_event: How should I eat the cucumber like this

goal_state.correction_event: I want the cucumber to be chopped and i want to have either a fork and a dinner knife on the table or in my hand.

experiments.initial_event: The plant has not been watered for a week

goal_state.correction_event: You should put water into the vase

experiments.initial_event: Why is the dirty coffee cup still on the coffee table

goal_state.correction_event: Put the coffee cup which is on the coffee table into the dishwasher

experiments.initial_event: There is too much stuff on the desk - I cannot work like this

goal_state.correction_event: Only the monitor and the keyboad should be on the desk. Remove everything else

experiments.initial_event: I want to use my new keyboard

goal_state.correction_event: I want you to put the keyboard on the desk

experiments.initial_event: I spilled my coffee

goal_state.correction_event: I want either a tissue or sponge or cloth in my or in your hand

experiments.initial_event: My friend is coming round soon. He will be hungry

goal_state.correction_event: Prepare the table with two plates and two forks and two dinner knifes

experiments.initial_event: My friend would like to eat a vegan muesli

goal_state.correction_event: I want vegan milk and cornflakes in a bowl and i want to have a spoon

experiments.initial_event: I would like to eat some normal muesli

goal_state.correction_event: I want normal milk and cornflakes in a bowl and i want to have a spoon

experiments.initial_event: The air is stuffy

goal_state.correction_event: Open the window and the door

experiments.initial_event: The coffee is too hot. I have burnt my mouth

goal_state.correction_event: I want a glass of cooled water

experiments.initial_event: I would like to eat yoghurt

goal_state.correction_event: I want a yoghurt and a spoon to eat it

experiments.initial_event: I need to take my medicine

goal_state.correction_event: I want a glass of water

experiments.initial_event: I have a headache

goal_state.correction_event: I want a glass of water

experiments.initial_event: My cup is empty

goal_state.correction_event: Refill my cup with water

experiments.initial_event: The 5 minutes are up. The tea is ready

goal_state.correction_event: Remove the tea bag from the teapot

goal_state.correction_event: I want an empty bowl and the nutcracker

goal_state.correction_event: I want the bowl with walnuts and an empty bowl and the nutcracker

goal_state.correction_event: I want the bowl with peanuts and an empty bowl

experiments.initial_event: I am full - please tidy up

goal_state.correction_event: Put the plate and the coffee cup and the bottle into the dishwasher and salad and the cucumber and the milk carton into the fridge. Close the dishwasher afterwards

experiments.initial_event: I want a glass of milk - I am lactose intolerant

goal_state.correction_event: I want to have a cup of vegan milk and you should close the milk carton and put it back into the fridge afterwards

experiments.initial_event: I want to watch TV and snack some peanuts

goal_state.correction_event: I want to have the bowl with the peanuts and an empty bowl and the remote

experiments.initial_event: Why is the milk still on the table?

goal_state.correction_event: Close the milk carton and put it into the refrigerator

experiments.initial_event: I feel dizzy i need water and fresh air

goal_state.correction_event: Open the window and bring me a cup of water

experiments.initial_event: Why are the vegan milk and the normal milk still on the table?

goal_state.correction_event: Close the milk cartons and put them into the refrigerator
